ProviderCapabilitySchema.description: The main schema that defines the structure of both Provider's production and sandbox capabilities.
ProviderCapabilitySchema.title: ProviderCapabilitySchema

CapabilityBody.description: Specifies the capabilities and configurations of the Provider for a given environment (e.g., production or sandbox).

identity_configuration.description: Specifies Identity Configuration details of the Provider such as Logo url, description, compliance related details.

api_configuration.description: Specifies API configuration details of the Provider including the base URL and any necessary credentials.

capabilities.description: Specifies the capabilities supported by the Provider with additional details such as supported countries and currencies.

product_identifiers.description: Specifies the custom fields which the Provider supports for a product to perform any special actions such as applying Tax exempt for a product.

customer_identifiers.description: Specifies the custom fields which the Provider supports for a customer to perform any special actions such as applying Tax exempt for a customer.

supported_number_of_line_items.description: Specifies the supported number of line items in an invoice or a credit note.

version.description: Specifies the Semantic Versioning of the schema.

CapabilityBody.title: Prod

APIConfiguration.description: Specifies API configuration details of the Provider including the base URL and any necessary credentials.

credential_configuration.description: Specifies the list of parameters that Provider needed for authentication & authorization.

APIConfiguration.title: APIConfiguration

CredentialConfiguration.description: Specifies the list of parameters that Provider needed for authentication & authorization.

id.description: Specifies the parameter name that Provider expects.

name.description: Specifies the name to be displayed for the provider app in Chargebee platform.

type.description: Specifies the type of the parameter.

is_sensitive.description: Specifies the the case sensitivity of the parameter.

is_required.description: Specifies if the Provider expects this parameter mandatorily.

CredentialConfiguration.title: CredentialConfiguration

supported_countries.description: Specifies the supported countries(ISO 3166 alpha-2 country code format) by the Provider for all the capabilities such as Tax calculation, syncing invoices/credit notes, TRN validation. If supported countries are different for each capabilities, it shall be specified under the respective capability.

supported_currencies.description: Specifies the supported currencies(ISO 4217 format) by the Provider for all the capabilities such as Tax calculation, syncing invoices/credit notes. If supported currencies are different for each capabilities, it shall be specified under the respective capability.

can_validate_shipping_address.description: Specifies if the full address validation is supported. Even if this is not supported by the Provider, it is mandatory that basic/partial address validation must be supported.

can_sync_invoices.description: Specifies if invoices can be synced to the Provider.

can_sync_credit_notes.description: Specifies if credit notes can be synced to the Provider.

can_support_currency_inclusive_of_taxes.description: Specifies if tax inclusivity is supported.

can_support_location_validation.description: Specifies if location validation is supported.

can_support_standalone_credit_notes.description: Specifies if stand alone credit note is supported.

is_consistent_pricing_supported.description: Specifies if consistent pricing is supported.

can_have_product_identifiers.description: Specifies if product custom fields are supported.

can_have_customer_identifiers.description: Specifies if customer custom fields are supported.

tax_calculation_capabilities.description: Specifies details on tax calculation capability.

invoice_sync_capabilities.description: Specifies details on invoice sync capability.

credit_note_sync_capabilities.description: Specifies details on credit note sync capability.

trn_validation_capabilities.description: Specifies details on TRN validation capability.

SyncCapabilities.description: Specifies details on sync capability for an entity such as invoice, credit note.

can_commit.description: Specifies if commit operation is supported. Commit operation can be described as an entity once commited cannot be modified.

can_delete.description: Specifies if delete operation is supported on the entity.

can_void.description: Specifies if void operation is supported on the entity.

supported_countries.description: Specifies the supported countries(ISO 3166 alpha-2 country code format) for this capability.

applicable_sync_types.description: Specifies the supported sync types to perform for an entity from Chargebee platform to the provider.

oneOf.description: Sync only PAID Invoices or ADJUSTED/REFUNDED Credit notes.
Commit only PAID Invoices or ADJUSTED/REFUNDED Credit notes.

SyncCapabilities.title: SyncCapabilities

is_supported.description: Specifies if the capability is supported.

batch_configuration.description: Specifies batch TRN Validation related configurations.

is_supported.description: Specifies if the operation is supported.

supported_countries.description: Specifies the supported countries(ISO 3166 alpha-2 country code format) and country specific configuration.

reference_number.description: Specifies about reference number configuration. Reference number is the number that provider provides as a proof of the TRN Validation.

is_supported.description: Specifies if the reference number is supported.

display_name.description: Specifies the name for the reference number attribute to display in Chargebee Platform.

customFields.description: Specifies the custom fields that are required or supported for the country.

TaxCalculationCapabilities.description: Specifies the configuration for the tax calculation.

accept_invalid_tax_reg_numbers.description: Specifies if invalid tax registration numbers are accepted.

supportedNumberOfLineItems.description: Specifies the supported number of line items.

TaxCalculationCapabilities.title: TaxCalculationCapabilities

Identifier.description: Specifies the custom identifiers for the entities such as Product and Customer.

external_id.description: Specifies the parameter name Provider expects.

display_name.description: Specifies the name of the parameter to be displayed in Chargebee platform.

is_mandatory.description: Specifies if the parameter is mandatory.

is_default.description: Specifies if the parameter has a default value.

Identifier.title: Identifier

IdentityConfiguration.description: Specifies Identity Configuration details of the Provider such as Logo url, description, compliance related details.

id.description: Specifies the identifier of the Provider

provider_type.description: Specifies the list of the features that the Provider supports. Provider may support Tax or Tax Registration Number(TRN) Validation capabilities or both.

display_name.description: Specifies the display name of the Provider in Chargebee platform.

logo_url.description: Specifies the logo url of the Provider to display in Chargebee platform.

primary_description.description: Specifies the primary description of the Provider.

secondary_description.description: Specifies the secondary description of the Provider.

signup_url.description: Specifies the url for the merchant to sign up with the provider.

consent_policy_url.description: Specifies the url about the consent related details of the Provider for the merchant.

privacy_policy_url.description: Specifies the url about the privacy related details of the Provider for the merchant.

terms_of_service_url.description: Specifies the url about the terms of services related details of the Provider for the merchant.

documentation_url.description: Specifies the url about the documentation details of the Provider for the merchant.

support_email.description: Specifies the support email of the Provider to reach out to incase of queries or escalations.
